name: PIXEL GUNSLINGER 3D - HARDCORE JOURNEY
description:
PIXEL GUNSLINGER 3D - HARDCORE JOURNEY - It is hardcore fast-paced FPS in decoration of Wild West with random generated levels (rouglike) and retro stylistics.

This is my tribute to games such as Outlaws and Painkiller. Yeah yeah. If you think what happens when you combine these two games, I have found the answer for you: PIXEL GUNSLINGER 3D - HARDCORE JOURNEY.

It is the real hardcore. This game doesn't forgive mistakes! Prepare to die and retreat again and again!

You are a proud shooter. Now you on the way of revenge. The one who made it will strongly regret!

(Soon on Mac OS X and Linux)

Features

- real hardcore

- random generated levels

- atmosphere of "old age shooter"

- great number of different enemies

- destroyable environment

- unstoppable action

- BONUS LEVELS

- chikens!

It is the real check of your skills!

DRM Free

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

  • Windows XP/Vista/7 (Windows 8 not tested)
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4xxx Series w/ 512MB VRAM
  • Hard Drive: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board chip will work
